title: Best Practices for Protecting Your Small or Medium Size Business from Phishing
description: Tips to educate users on what Phishing is and how to stay safe from hackers trying to hijack your PC and data through phishing attacks over email.- Learn why hosted solutions like Office 365 are vulnerable to phishing.- Discover why you must protect both your employees AND your customers.- Understand what real-time website scanning should look for.Read why checking reputation databases once a day is a waste of time.- Get strategies for saving time and money on email protection.- Receive a summary list of phishing protection best practices.Book is available at phishprotection.com
author: DuoCircle
